name: Delicious Pizza
description: Pizza so good you'll eat another!

effects.name: Eat the pizza
effects.description: Eat the pizza and feel less hungry.

name: Fun Chew Toy

name: Energy drink

effects.name: Drink it
effects.description: Drink the drink and feel more energetic!
